value:
Summoners sure are amazing. If I
had that kind of power, I'd call the
strongest Heroes and spar nonstop!

I may not look it, but I'm a prince of
Hoshido. Not that I knew this growing
up in the Deeprealms...$k$pI still have trouble wrapping my head
around one day becoming a king.

Don't get so caught up in other tasks
that you neglect your training. I can
take over fishing duties for you.$k$pBesides, there's nothing like a freshly
grilled fish to get you pumped up!

I know you're not much of a fighter,
but how about we test your strength?
You can arm wrestle, can't you?

Yo, $Nu! You
caught me training. I really know my
way around a lance, don't ya think?

Phew! I ran all the way here to give
you this greeting from
$Nf.
This is what I've been training for!

Oh yeah! Getting stronger by the
day!

Maybe I didn't train enough... I
need to step it up.

Is this your way of telling me I
need to build inner strength, too?

I'm Shiro. Nice to meet ya! Have you
heard of my father Ryoma? I'm
training to be stronger than him!

Yo, you got some time today? Then
let's chat! I've had something on my
mind for a while now...$k$pYou're the strongest member of the
Order of Heroes, right? I mean, your
strategies are pretty solid...$k$pNot to mention how you can summon
all those awesome Heroes!$k$pSince coming here, you helped me
realize there's more to being strong
than swinging a weapon.$k$pI've really come to admire your type of
strength. So I'll make up for the fact
you can't fight like the rest of us.$k$pIf you ever need help, just give me a
holler and I'll come running. I'll take
out any enemy who gets in your way!$k$pYou've truly mastered the power of
your soul. So until I learn how to use
that sort of strength for myself...$k$pallow me to fight by your side.
はっ！
むんっ！
うわっ！
強いな…！
Any last words?
You ready for this?
I won't give up!
I won't lose.
Father... I'm sorry...
Haha
You're saying I can get stronger by helping the Order of Heroes?
If you're feeling a bit sluggish, let's head out for a run.
Lances beat katana, so that means I should be able to best my father.
If it's all right with you, let me help out with your work around here. I can turn anything into a training session!
I want to test my skills. Do you know any Heroes who would be up for sparring?
Someday I'll inherit Raijinto from my father...
I always try to fight the strongest foes I can find, but I don't try to take them on alone anymore. I want to keep fighting by your side.
Right!
I'm Shiro!
Let's battle!
